Tar Confusion Effect: Uncontrollable laughter, as per a Tasha's hideous laughter spell

Believes the tar is delicious food and will attempt to eat it. (The tar inflicts 1d6 fire damage, or 3d6 fire damage if swallowed. It is also poisonous, requiring a DC 12 Constitution saving throw to avoid an additional 2d6 damage accompanied by vomiting.)
Move in a random direction (possibly motivated by hallucinations).
